entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
